Net::NodeInfo* FT::RestartProtocol::get_chkserver ( Net::GlobalId  gid2restart  ) 

Return the NodeInfo of the checkpoint server associated to gid2restart on the given community The implementation contact the kaapiserver to request field gid<gid2restart>.checkpoint.gidserver

Net::NodeInfo* FT::RestartProtocol::get_nodeinfo ( Net::GlobalId  gid  ) 

Return the NodeInfo of the gid 'gid' The implementation try to get information about the node from the network. If it failed, then the kaapiserver is contacted to request field gid<gid2>.url.

bool  sync,
const std::set< Net::GlobalId > &  nodes2restart,
ka_uint32_t  version = ChkId::LAST_VERSION 
) [pure virtual]

Tell to the current process to restart all contexts from a set of gids with given version

Parameters:
[in] nodes2restart the global identifiers to restart
[in] version the version of the contexts to restart

bool  sync,
Util::GlobalId  gid,
ka_uint32_t  version = ChkId::LAST_VERSION 
) [virtual]

Tell to the current process to restart all contexts from gid with given version Default implementation if to call restart with a set that contains only gid.

Parameters:

[in] version the version of the contexts to restart
